;-*-rst-*-

================
ClueMapperThemer
================

Overview
========

ClueMapperThemer is the integration component between ClueMapper and the
Deliverance theming engine.  Please see ClueMapper_ for further details.

Credits
=======

  * Rocky Burt (maintainer) - rocky AT serverzen DOT com

.. _ClueMapper: http://www.cluemapper.org
